agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: House Administration TIME & DATE: Upon adjournment Wednesday, March 20, 2019 PLACE: E2.010 CHAIR: Rep. Charlie Geren HCR 135 Bonnen, Greg Relating to adopting a Joint Rule of the Senate and House of Representatives assigning to each bill passed by the legislature a legislative act number. HR 901 Bonnen, Greg Amending the permanent rules of the House of Representatives of the 86th Legislature designating the style and format of filing bills for the 87th and succeeding legislatures. Notice of this meeting was announced from the house floor. NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
